official_title: A bill to authorize the establishment of the Fort Buford unit of the Fort Union Trading Post National Historic Site in the State of North Dakota.

summary.text: Authorizes the establishment of the Fort Buford unit of the Fort Union Trading Post National Historic Site in the State of North Dakota.
